alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 04 at 1:07PM CDT until June 04 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 106 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Amarillo, Bushland, Valley De Oro and Mescalero Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
